constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 209 (Friday, December 3, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. O'HALLERAN:
H.R. 6141.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Clause 18, section 8 of article 1 of the Constitution
[Page H6915]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands.

title: To make technical amendments to Public Law 93-531 relating to lands of the Navajo Nation, and for other purposes.
